overview.title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
overview.subtitle: 10% Vitamin C
overview.description: A premium skincare serum designed for oily and combination skin types.

benefits.heading: Key Benefits
benefits.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum delivers Brightening and fades dark spots for your skin.

ingredients.heading: Key Ingredients
ingredients.description: Key ingredients include Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

usage.heading: How to Use
usage.instructions: Apply 2-3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

details.safety_note: Note: Mild tingling for sensitive skin
